channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside Alma Birk House on Cavendish Road, 4th December
item.description:
Someone left an old piece of furniture /see on photo/ near to the gate of Alma Birk House's gare. The fly tipping is actually located on Mowbray Road /close to the corner of Cavendish Road/. It appeared sometime between Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cavendish Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load
